name: Zoom Signature Node.js
description: Genrerate a signature to Start and Join Meetings with the Zoom Web SDK.

ZOOM_API_KEY.description: Your Zoom JWT App API Key, found on your Zoom JWT App Credentials page

ZOOM_API_SECRET.description: Your Zoom JWT App API Secret, found on your Zoom JWT App Credentials page

ZOOM_API_TOKEN.description: Your Zoom JWT App token, found on your Zoom JWT App Credentials page
